opt_del: Our optimized delivery process ensures that your order is delivered to you quickly and conveniently
title_1_card: 1. Create a Free account in Deliver X today
desc_1_card: Join the growing community of satisfied customers and create your free account in Deliver X today
title_2_card: 2. Place an order at your favorite restaurant
desc_2_card: Browse our extensive range, check out the mouth-watering menus and place your order with just a few taps
title_3_card: 3. Receive the order right at home, without unnecessary hassle
desc_3_card: Our reliable delivery service ensures that your order will be delivered right to your doorstep, hot and fresh
footer_desc: At Delivery X, we pride ourselves on providing seamless and efficient logistics to businesses of all sizes.

desc_in_modal: Deliver X is a modern food delivery service that offers a convenient and fast solution for ordering dishes from your favorite restaurants right at your doorstep. We strive to make the process of ordering food as simple and enjoyable as possible, providing high quality service and a wide selection of dishes.
